mapper.select: select khachhang.tenkh,khachhang.email,ngaychieu.giobatdau,ngaychieu.giobatdau-'00:30:00' as deadline, phim.tenphim, phongchieu.tenphong||' - '|| ghe.tenghe as hangghe,ngaychieu.ngay|| ' - '|| ngaychieu.giobatdau as nc, ve.giave, topping.tentopping, ordertopping.soluongmua from ve join khachhang on khachhang.makh = ve.makh join ChiTietGhe on ChiTietGhe.mactghe = ve.mactghe join ghe on ghe.maghe = ChiTietGhe.maghe join xuatchieu on xuatchieu.stt = ve.stt_xc join phim on phim.maphim = xuatchieu.maphim join ngaychieu on ngaychieu.stt = xuatchieu.ngay join phongchieu on phongchieu.maphong = xuatchieu.maphong left join ordertopping on ordertopping.idve = ve.idve left join topping on topping.matopping = ordertopping.matopping where ve.idve not in (select hoadon.idve from hoadon) and ngaychieu.giobatdau-'00:30:00' >cast( to_char(now(), 'HH24:MI:SS') as time) and ngaychieu.ngay = CURRENT_DATE and phongchieu.macn = 'cn1' order by ve.idve;
